content.question: Between 1890 and 1910, the United States most strongly pursued a foreign policy promoting

choices.label: close military alliances with Great Britain and France
a sphere of influence in Africa
commercial involvement in both Latin America and eastern Asia
a campaign to slow the spread of socialism in eastern Europe

content.answer: commercial involvement in both Latin America and eastern Asia

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
